name: aBoxCollecThingys
description:
You play as a box who has to collect little red diamonds.

Watch out for the straight walls tho... don't say i didn't warn you...

Oh, and... your earphones are working fine, don't worry... just put on some good music and you'll see.

If you feel like commenting or reviewing, you can write: 

  • your opinion in general
  • constuctive critique about things you think could be polished 
  • things i should keep an eye out in future projects
  • what did you like about the game?
  • what did you dislike about the game?
  • what type of camera did you prefered here: still camera or moving along the box-character?
  • what type of game do you usually like? (and justify, if you feel like it)
  • etc.

These were just a few ideas of possible comment topics you could choose from.

thank you so much for playing, mi (gender neutral) dude.

disclaimer: 

this is my first game development project, so... it is not the best at all (and has no sound due to some struggles i had with the build)... but it's a start (and, most importantly, a completed game) :) 

enjoy :)
